b12.title: Complement: a key system for immune surveillance and homeostasis
b12.reason: This is a seminal review that offers a broad overview of complement functioning and its role in health and disease states

b57.title: Autocrine Effects of Tumor-Derived Complement
b57.reason: This article shows that tumour cells secrete complement proteins that act in an autocrine fashion to induce tumorigenesis

b73.title: A Combined PD-1/C5a Blockade Synergistically Protects against Lung Cancer Growth and Metastasis
b73.reason: This article shows evidence for a beneficial role of combined therapeutic inhibition of complement and immune checkpoint molecules

b137.title: Protection of host cells by complement regulators
b137.reason: This review summarizes the function of complement inhibitors and their involvement in pathologic conditions
